price: Wir wissen ja, daß deine Brust beklommen ist wegen dessen, was sie sagen.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ نَعۡلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدۡرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: walaqad naʿlamu annaka yaḍīqu ṣadruka bimā yaqūlūna
